snippet: Many Wall Street analysts and heart specialists are lukewarm about the drug, which has shown mixed results in clinical trials.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves Corlanor, drug used to treat chronic heart failure that has shown mixed results in clinical trials.
lead_paragraph: Many Wall Street analysts and heart specialists are lukewarm about the drug, which has shown mixed results in clinical trials.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Amgen Drug to Treat Heart Failure
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Drug to Treat Heart
